price: Na hakika Nuhu alitwita, na Sisi ni bora wa waitikiaji.
footnotes: Na hakika Nuhu alitwita alipo kwisha kata tamaa na watu wake, basi na Sisi tukawa ni wabora wa kuitikia wito wake, tulipo muitikia ombi lake, na tukawaangamiza watu wake kwa tofani.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
